column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to Patricia Kirke''' .

column1: *'''Publication:''' A photo of the letter was included in ''[[The Superior Galleries May 9th
column4: Maps and Manuscripts] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net/ TolkienBooks.net] (accessed 24 May 2015)</ref>

column1: *'''Description:''' Tolkien writes to Patricia Kirke on a Merton College Christmas card that work and correspondence prevented him from writing any Christmas cards or letters until the previous week. He mentions also that his daughter Priscilla is spending a year at the London School of Economics for a diploma.<ref>[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]]
column2: [http://www.hammondandscull.com/addenda/chronology.html Addenda and Corrigenda to ''The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide'' (2006) Vol. 1: Chronology] (accessed 24 May 2015)</ref>

column1: *[[Letter to Leila Keene and Pat Kirke]]
